summary: This is an email forwarding a link to an NBC News TODAY show segment titled 'Jeffrey Epstein accusers detail abuse in NBC News exclusive.' The email was sent on September 20, 2019, and references an exclusive interview with Epstein's accusers.

persons.name: Jonathan Dienst
persons.context: Sender of the original email containing the link to the NBC News exclusive segment about Jeffrey Epstein's accusers.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the NBC News exclusive where his accusers detail abuse allegations against him.

events.title: NBC News Exclusive on Epstein Accusers
events.description: NBC News releases an exclusive segment on the TODAY show where Jeffrey Epstein's accusers detail abuse allegations.

keyFacts: An NBC News exclusive segment aired on September 20, 2019, featuring Jeffrey Epstein's accusers detailing abuse allegations.
The segment was promoted via email by NBCUniversal journalist Jonathan Dienst.
The document is an email forwarding a link to the TODAY show piece about the Epstein case.
